channel.title: GitHub on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on LiaScript

item.title: What Do Poland and Arnold Schwarzenegger Have in Common?
item.description: … for translating open textbooks into interactive LiaScript books. But, based on our discussions at the eLearning Africa Conference we realized that there is a need for open textbooks for various purposes.

item.title: Open Source Community Projects on GitHub versus Traditional Publishing Models for OER
item.description: In this post, I will aim to make a case for Git and GitHub by comparing how “traditional” publishing models (for OER) can be improved through dynamic, flexible, and transparent open-source community projects.
